name: Minitais
description:
In this chaotic co-op game, you control elements that can be fused
to get the most suitable element to defeat the villain!

You will be able to find the best fusion possible while try to dodge
the macabre boss attacks?

Game developed for Game Jam Plus - 2019
Rate the Game

How to Play 🎮

• Use A and D to Move

• Use Space to Jump

• Fusion: Mouse to Adjust Crosshair

• Fusion: Click Mouse to Fire
